articles.title: BMW turns on Apple Smart Key tech - Pistonheads.com
articles.description: iPhone and iWatch users can now access, drive and configure their cars using BMW's app instead of a key
articles.content: BMW has made it possible for customers to access their cars via Apple’s Smart Key tech, which replaces a conventional key with an app on a user’s iPhone or iWatch. While the tech itself isn’t new – r… [+1810 chars]
